content.name: NkkH

content.text: I want to tell you about some things I dream of. I would like to become a famous ballerina, and I know that in order to do that, I must train and practice and practice, but there are some other things I would like to do in the future. I would like to help animals that need shelter, as there are many animals on the streets, and we should help them. I would also like to be a businesswoman, have a company, and generate jobs for others. I would like to take care of my family; we are from a very small town, and we moved to a larger city so my sister and I could have more job opportunities when we grew up. There are many things I dream of, but first, I must go to school and help my parents with the family business. They have a small shop, and I help them in the afternoons; that’s where I do my homework. I’m not very happy about the job, but I’m glad to help them; I would like to be able to do more for them.
content.name: 60DB
4Cs6
